metadata.title: CVE-2021-33293 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Panorama Tools libpano13 v2.9.20 was discovered to contain an out-of-boundsread in the function panoParserFindOLine() in parser.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpano13-3 - 2.9.21+dfsg-3build1
libpano13-bin - 2.9.21+dfsg-3build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpano13 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.21+dfsg-3build1').
